refnamediv.refpurpose: Adjusts a given control in a Faust DSP instance.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in faustcsound. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Faustctl will set a given control in a running faust program

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Scontrol -- a string containing the control name
idsp -- a handle to an existing Faust DSP instance

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kval -- value to which the control will be set.
